content: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Twitter has undeservedly attracted a bunch of new followers. The struggling social-media company touted surprise user growth as evidence it can get back on track under moonlighting Chief Executive Jack Dorsey. Revenue  however  fell 8 percent in the first quarter  a first since Twitter went public in 2013  as advertisers grew skeptical.
name: Twitter Inc
title: Twitter unduly attracts financial followers
